Assumptions: WWF estimates a minimum of 20% reduction in air travel  in 5 years by utilizing all possible measures. We estimate a 20% reduction until 2050 by VC alone

Specific Geographic Location: 14 out of 17 countries where Vodafone operates
Assumptions: A 20% reduction in air travel is attributed to several factors, the primary one being Videoconferencing

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Cairns (2009), Can teleconferencing reduce business travel?
Assumptions: The upper range of the possible reduction mentioned is taken as the optimistic case

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Wang and Law (2007)  Impacts of Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) on time use and travel behavior: A structural equations analysis
Assumptions: The study mentions that travel either not be substituted by VC or even increase due to VC in the worst case scenario.

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Dodgson et al (1997) 'Motors or Modems' study for the RAC
